notes.text:
This update for bluez fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:

- CVE-2016-9918: Fixed a out-of-bound read in the packet_hexdump function (bsc#1015173)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: In BlueZ 5.42, an out-of-bounds read was identified in "packet_hexdump" function in "monitor/packet.c" source file. This issue can be triggered by processing a corrupted dump file and will result in btmon crash.
notes.title: CVE description
